lines.text: let int arrays a of size 1005 and b of size 1005
for i = 0 to N exclusive , read a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < N ; ++ i ) cin >> a [ i ] ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to N exclusive , read b [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < N ; ++ i ) cin >> b [ i ] ;

lines.text: create ints temp1 = a [ 0 ] and temp2 = b [ 0 ]

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < N ; ++ i )

lines.text: set temp1 to temp1 | a [ i ]
set temp2 to temp2 | b [ i ]
print the result of temp1 + temp2
